name: The Circus Boss
description:
Welcome Guys, to "The Circus Boss"!

The game was created for the "Weeks Jam". 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What do you have to do?

You only need to kill one boss. So dodge them skillfully and collect the glowing item, which you can then place with the Space button. The item is a particle bomb that must be placed near the enemy and explodes immediately. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How do you move?

There is a settings menu in the game that explains this to you, but for the lazy among you ;D. 

WASD keys are for the player's movements 

Space key places the bomb

ESC key calls the pause menu

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have fun and a happy clown laugh

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Information

The game is of course not yet fully developed.

I also recommend you to download it for better resolution, graphics and performance.
